      • auth

        @Path(value="/auth/{issuer_id}")
 @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response auth(@FormParam(value="state")
                                                                                                                                    String state,
                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="issuer_id")
                                                                                                                                    String issuerId,
                                                                                                                                    @HeaderParam(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                    String authorization)
        The state that is passed here is transformed to a JWT before passing to the OIDC IP.
        Parameters:
        state - this is a client level state
        issuerId - issuer
        Returns:
        a redirect
